snippet: Erin Durant, a Brooklyn singer-songwriter who prefers the real thing to an electronic keyboard, performs with her belly-high instrument, which weighs as much as 10 tubas.
abstract: Singer songwriter Erin Durant enlists help of friends and sometimes strangers to haul her 232-pound piano from her home in Red Hook, Brooklyn, to gigs around New York City; feels task is worth time and effort because she prefers sound of acoustic instrument over electronic keyboard.
lead_paragraph: Erin Durant, a Brooklyn singer-songwriter who prefers the real thing to an electronic keyboard, performs with her belly-high instrument, which weighs as much as 10 tubas.

headline.main: A Pianist and Her 232-Pound Upright, Going Gig to Gig in New York
headline.print_headline: A Pianist and Her 232-Pound Upright, Going Gig to Gig
